languages.text: {n}Неловкое движение руки — и вы отсекаете слишком большой кусок плоти. Культя неожиданно взбухает и на ваших глазах наплывает на все реле целиком — явная мутация, вызванная энергиями {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варпа{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Неловкое движение руки — и вы отсекаете слишком большой кусок плоти. Культя неожиданно взбухает и на ваших глазах наплывает на все реле целиком — явная мутация, вызванная энергиями варпа.{/n}

languages.text: {n}A clumsy twitch of your hand — and you cut off too much flesh. The stump suddenly swells, and you watch as it consumes the entire relay — clearly a mutation caused by {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} energies.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Неловкое движение руки — и вы отсекаете слишком большой кусок плоти. Культя неожиданно взбухает и на ваших глазах наплывает на все реле целиком — явная мутация, вызванная энергиями {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варпа{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}One wrong hand motion — and you cut off too much of the flesh. The stump suddenly swells, and you watch as it consumes the entire relay — clearly a mutation caused by Warp energies.{/n}
{n}One wrong hand motion — and you cut off too much of the flesh. The stump suddenly swells, and you watch as it consumes the entire relay — clearly a mutation caused by Warp energies.{/n}

{n}One wrong hand motion — and you cut off too much flesh. The stump suddenly swells, and you watch as it consumes the entire relay — clearly a mutation caused by {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} energies.{/n}

{n}One wrong hand motion — and you cut off too much flesh. The stump suddenly swells, and you watch as it consumes the entire relay — clearly a mutation caused by {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} energies.{/n}

{n}A clumsy twitch of your hand — and you cut off too much flesh. The stump suddenly swells, and you watch as it consumes the entire relay — clearly a mutation caused by {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} energies.{/n}

{n}A clumsy twitch of your hand — and you cut off too much flesh. The stump suddenly swells, and you watch as it consumes the entire relay — clearly a mutation caused by {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} energies.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你的手笨拙地抖了一下，一不小心切下来一大块肉。那个肿瘤突然膨胀起来，将整个继电器吞噬其中。很显然，这是由{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}的能量造成的变异。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A clumsy twitch of your hand — and you cut off too much flesh. The stump suddenly swells, and you watch as it consumes the entire relay — clearly a mutation caused by {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} energies.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的手笨拙地抖了一下，一不小心切下来一大块肉。那个肿瘤突然膨胀起来，将整个继电器吞噬其中。很显然，这是由{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}的能量造成的变异。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Se te resbala la mano y cortas demasiada carne. El bulto de pronto se hincha y ves cómo consume el relé entero. Claramente se trata de una mutación causada por las energías de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A clumsy twitch of your hand — and you cut off too much flesh. The stump suddenly swells, and you watch as it consumes the entire relay — clearly a mutation caused by {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} energies.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Se te resbala la mano y cortas demasiada carne. El bulto de pronto se hincha y ves cómo consume el relé entero. Claramente se trata de una mutación causada por las energías de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ぎこちないプルプルと震える手つきで、肉を切りすぎてしまう。切断部分がブワッと膨らんで、目の前で継電器を丸々飲み込んだ…どうみても{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}歪み{/g}のエネルギーで起こった突然変異だ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A clumsy twitch of your hand — and you cut off too much flesh. The stump suddenly swells, and you watch as it consumes the entire relay — clearly a mutation caused by {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} energies.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ぎこちないプルプルと震える手つきで、肉を切りすぎてしまう。切断部分がブワッと膨らんで、目の前で継電器を丸々飲み込んだ…どうみても{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}歪み{/g}のエネルギーで起こった突然変異だ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Eine ungeschickte Handbewegung – und du entfernst zu viel Fleisch. Der Wulst schwillt plötzlich an und verschlingt das gesamte Relais – ohne Zweifel eine Mutation, die von {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}-Energien verursacht wurde.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A clumsy twitch of your hand — and you cut off too much flesh. The stump suddenly swells, and you watch as it consumes the entire relay — clearly a mutation caused by {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} energies.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine ungeschickte Handbewegung – und du entfernst zu viel Fleisch. Der Wulst schwillt plötzlich an und verschlingt das gesamte Relais – ohne Zweifel eine Mutation, die von {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}-Energien verursacht wurde.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un tressautement maladroit de la main vous fait couper une trop grande quantité de chair. Le moignon enfle soudainement et engloutit tout le relais sous vos yeux. Il s'agit assurément d'une mutation provoquée par les énergies du {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A clumsy twitch of your hand — and you cut off too much flesh. The stump suddenly swells, and you watch as it consumes the entire relay — clearly a mutation caused by {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} energies.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un tressautement maladroit de la main vous fait couper une trop grande quantité de chair. Le moignon enfle soudainement et engloutit tout le relais sous vos yeux. Il s'agit assurément d'une mutation provoquée par les énergies du {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Elin acemice seğirdiği için çok fazla doku kesiyorsun. Kestiğin yer, gözlerinin önünde aniden şişip tüm röleyi kaplıyor. {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Öteboyut{/g} enerjilerinin neden olduğu bir mutasyon olduğu açık.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A clumsy twitch of your hand — and you cut off too much flesh. The stump suddenly swells, and you watch as it consumes the entire relay — clearly a mutation caused by {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} energies.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Elin acemice seğirdiği için çok fazla doku kesiyorsun. Kestiğin yer, gözlerinin önünde aniden şişip tüm röleyi kaplıyor. {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Öteboyut{/g} enerjilerinin neden olduğu bir mutasyon olduğu açık.{/n}
